Title: Relates to commercial rent protections
Summary: Prevents landlords from raising commercial rents during a lease without a determination by an arbitrator that such rent increase is not fraudulent and is fair.
LawCode: Add Title 22 Chap 12 §§22-1201 - 22-1211, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to commercial rent protections
